All Classes

Class Description
AmbientLight
AmbientLight class represents the ambient light color in a scene
BasicRayTracer
BasicRayTracer is tracing rays from the camera to the scene and calculate the color of the point the ray hits
Camera
Camera class represents the location and the direction of the camera that watch the scene, and the dimensions of view plane the scene is watched through
CameraIntegrationTest
Testing integration between creating ray from Camera to find intersection with Geometries
CameraTest
Testing Camera Class
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Coordinate
Class Coordinate is the basic class representing a coordinate for Cartesian coordinate system.
Cylinder
class Cylinder representing a cylinder in a 3D cartesian coordinate system the class inherit from Tube
CylinderTest
Testing Cylinder
DirectionalLight
DirectionalLight represents a powerful light source that it's intensity does not attenuate by distance
Geometries
Geometries representing collection of geometries shapes, as part of implementing composite design pattern
GeometriesTest
Testing Geometries
Geometry
Geometry is interface for geometric shapes
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriterTest
Testing render.ImageWriter
Intersectable
Intersectable is an interface for intersectable by ray geometries
Intersectable.GeoPoint
GeoPoint is helper class used to link Point3D to the geometry in which it is located
Light
class Light is abstract class parent of different kinds of lights in the scene
LightSource
LightSource is interface to different light sources illuminating the scene
LightsTests
Test rendering a basic image
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Material
Material class describe material by it's behavior when light hit it
Plane
class Plane representing a plane in a 3D cartesian coordinate system
PlaneTest
Testing Plane
Point3D
class Point3D representing a point in a 3D cartesian coordinate system
Point3DTest
Point3D testing
PointLight
PointLight represents an omni-directional point light source
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
PolygonTest
Testing Polygons
Ray
class Ray representing a Ray - part of a line that has a fixed starting point
RayTest
Unit tests for primitives.Ray class
RayTracerBase
abstract class to trace a ray and calculate the color of the point the ray hits
ReflectionRefractionTests
Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
Render
Render class creates the color matrix from the scene
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
class Scene represents a scene - data structure representing geometries, textures, lights, shading, and view point information
ShadowTests
Testing basic shadows
Sphere
class Sphere representing a sphere in a 3D cartesian coordinate system
SphereTest
Testing Sphere
SpotLight
SpotLight represents a point light source with direction author Reuven Klein
TargetSurface
TargetSurface class represents an imaginary squared surface used to send rays to it when the color of glossy surfaces/diffused glass is calculated
Triangle
class Triangle representing a triangle in a 3D cartesian coordinate system the class inherit from Polygon
TriangleTest
Testing Triangle
Tube
class Tube representing a tube in a 3D cartesian coordinate system
TubeTest
Testing Tube
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
class vector representing a 3D vector
VectorTest
Unit tests for primitives.Vector class
